user_question: Plan a two-week itinerary for a family vacation in Japan, focusing on cultural experiences and family-friendly activities.
final_answer: The itinerary includes Tokyo, Kyoto, Hiroshima, Osaka, and Shirakawa-go, covering cultural and family-friendly activities.
